abstract: Nigerian Pres Muhammadu Buhari issues directive dissolving board of Nigerian National Petroleum Corp, state oil company where billions of dollars is reported missing; directive is issued before Buhari names cabinet.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria’s new president, Muhammadu Buhari, on Friday dissolved the board of the state oil company from which billions of dollars is reported to be missing.

headline.main: Nigeria: Board of State Oil Company Is Dissolved After Corruption Scandal
headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Board of State Oil Company Is Dissolved After Corruption Scandal

snippet: Nigeria’s new president, Muhammadu Buhari, on Friday dissolved the board of the state oil company from which billions of dollars is reported to be missing.
